title: Hey guys
body: Riot didn't make bot lane for an ADC and a Support, the players did.  Believe it or not, there are many other places that champions can go and still be viable, especially when a team builds around it.  Just because Riot actually wants to encourage this for a change does not mean you should completely flip out and make calls to arms on a rework you probably haven't even tried yet.  I bet most of you don't even play Morde :P

replies.body: I take Anivia bot lane filling the role of adc but still AP. I run this whenever I end up with an ad mid on my team. Easy easy easy getting fed.
